response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe holds immense value and could potentially revolutionize your business or personal endeavors. This extraordinary opportunity comes with an initial offer of $15,000. We understand that the true worth of this product may be subjective, but we are confident it will exceed your expectations. Should you choose to accept this offer, we promise a seamless transaction and exceptional customer service. If you require more information or have any questions, please do not hesitate to reach out. Thank you for considering our product.", "product_price": 15000}
